==Project structure ==

The source tree contains a number of XCode projects and is organized as follow:

*Mac OS X*
|| main project || upnpx/projects/macos/upnpx.xcodeproj ||
|| build || upnpx/projects/macos/build ||

*iOS*
|| main project || upnpx/projects/ios/upnpx.xcodeproj ||
|| build || upnpx/projects/ios/build ||

*Sources*

|| source files || upnpx/src ||

*Header files:*
|| Public Headers || upnpx/src/api || This include should contain all headers needed by developers using libupnpx.a ||
